Package graphics

Class Display

java.lang.Object
graphics.Display
public class Display extends Object
A class for creating a JFrame to display the game.

  • Method Details

    • createDisplay

      private void createDisplay()
      Creates the JFrame and the Canvas in which the graphics are drawn to.

    • changeScale

      public void changeScale​(int newScale)
      Changes the display size of the JFrame by the specified scale. The normal resolution is 640x360 and the default scale is 2, so it will result in a JFrame of size 1280x720.

    • getJFrame

      public JFrame getJFrame()

    • getCanvas
